title: What is that red devil face warning
body:
when you get low on health, what is that red face that appears over your name?
 
I Googled it a million times and there is no answer as to what it actually means.

Hovering over it doesn't tell you anything, it just hangs there. 

What kind of thing is that for Riot to never explain to anyone what that is supposed to be?

replies.body: I believe you are speaking of the notification that you are a tasty target for Warwick.
Fyi: It is in the champion spotlight if you watch it. It means he's activated blood hunt and you're the closest enemy champion when he activated it.
A devil face??? Teemo?   I'm really not sure what you mean.  Can you offer a screenshot?
